name: TamilPanchangam
0:
”Alexa ask Tamil Panchangam to start”
”next one”
”whats today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tamil panchangam
des: According to Hindu Tamil Calendar called Panchangam, it is best to avoid certain times within a day so you can save yourselves from troubles. for ex, starting a travel during a 'Raghu' kalam is said to bring difficulties reaching the destination and the purpose of travel.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
